text: This is a simple single line message.
translation: Huu ni ujumbe rahisi wa laini moja.

text: This is a longer message with a comma, a full stop and a few random characters. --&
translation: Hii ni ujumbe mrefu na comma, kusimamishwa kamili na herufi chache za nasibu. --&

text:
This is a message on multiple lines.
- Line 1
- Line 2
- Line 3
They should appear on separate lines
translation:
Huu ni ujumbe kwenye mistari mingi.
- Mstari wa 1
- Mstari wa 2
- Mstari wa 3
Wanapaswa kuonekana kwenye mistari tofauti

text: This message has an <html> tag. This should be displayed as plain text.
translation: Ujumbe huu una tepe ya <html>. Hii inapaswa kuonyeshwa kama maandishi wazi.
